column4: Hey all.  I'm trying to downgrade from Dapper to Breezy.  I've pinned all the packages to the Breezy build, but I'm getting an error that libc is trying to overwrite something that is also in the locales packages.  Can anyone help?
you can use dpkg-divert to resolve that I believe
see man dpkg-divert - I've never had to use it, so I have nothing to add to the manpage
